mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this, folks! I waltz into my local Bank of Entitlement branch, demanding they deliver my morning latte to my office. When the teller hesitated, I threw a fit! "How dare you deny me my caffeine fix!" I bellowed, causing a scene that would make even the divas of Hollywood proud. Eventually, they caved and sent an employee scrambling to fulfill my request. And let me tell you, that latte tasted even sweeter knowing I made them dance to my tune. Ah, the power of entitlement!
